ComicInfo.Summary: Freak Force is heavily criticized for police brutality. Mighty Man saves Freak Force from the Annihilators. Dragon shuts out Mrs. Schwartzblatt. The new freak recruits quit. Dragon and Lt. Darling hope CyberFace's testimony against OverLord will solve their problems.
